translations: n．药剂师，药商：在药店工作的专业人士，负责出售药品、化妆品等，并提供相关建议。
· The druggists are responsible for dispensing medications to patients.
药剂师负责向患者发放药物。

phrs.translation: 零售药师协会, 全国零售药师协会, 全国药商协会
欧洲药商联合会, 欧洲药剂商联合会

sentences.sentence: Druggists must dispense medicines with the greatest care .
sentences.translation: 药剂师必须极其小心地配制药品。

sentences.sentence: He continues, "Almost all druggists in a small town will tell you the same thing."
sentences.translation: 他接着说，“几乎所有小镇上的药剂师都会跟你说同样的话。”

sentences.sentence: He vends his own secret medicines, so he keeps away from the doors of the druggists.
sentences.translation: 他出售他自己的秘药，因而他总是避开药店的大门。
